named-query.name: getUserPermissions
named-query.query: select distinct p.value from Account a inner join a.roles r inner join r.permissions p where a.id = :userId and p.value like '%:show'

named-query.name: getAccountsByDepartmentIdAndRoleId
named-query.query: select a from Account a inner join a.roles r where a.department.id = :departmentId and r.id = :roleId

named-query.name: getAccountByName
named-query.query: select a from Account a where a.realName = :name
